column4: I think that the ubuntu version is supposed to look pretty and lag so it feels more like windows
it is ridiculously awful how long it takes, and if you do almost anything in the partitioner, it again rescans for minutes
the last partitioner I used that was that bad was MS-DOS FDISK, which would slowly scan the partition table each time you did something
I would try a more general channel like ##Linux or possibly ##Networking
